title: card.binary Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

cobs.description:
The size of COBS-encoded data stored in the reserved area (without the trailing 
).

connected.description: Returns true if the Notecard is connected to the network.

err.description: If present, a string describing the error that occurred during transmission.

length.description: The amount of unencoded data currently stored (in bytes).

max.description: The space available (in bytes) for storing unencoded data on the Notecard.

status.description: The MD5 checksum calculated for the entire unencoded buffer.

samples.title: Binary Status Response
samples.description: Example response showing binary storage status.
